post_call_analysis_data.name: interested_in_appointment
post_call_analysis_data.description: User's interest level in scheduling appointment

post_call_analysis_data.name: agreement_appointment
post_call_analysis_data.description: User's agreement to our appointment: (yes, no)

post_call_analysis_data.name: should_send_confirmation
post_call_analysis_data.description: Whether we should send appointment confirmation message to the client through whatsapp: (yes, no)

post_call_analysis_data.name: appointment_date
post_call_analysis_data.description: Confirmed appointment date in ISO format (e.g., 2025-10-31)

post_call_analysis_data.name: preferred_appointment_time
post_call_analysis_data.description: User's preferred appointment time: morning or afternoon (e.g., morning, afternoon)

post_call_analysis_data.name: should_contact_again
post_call_analysis_data.description: Whether the agent should contact user again via WhatsApp: (yes, no)

post_call_analysis_data.name: contact_again_reason
post_call_analysis_data.description: Reason for contacting again: (available_time, user_requested_callback, user_busy, other)

post_call_analysis_data.name: user_requested_alternative_date
post_call_analysis_data.description: Whether user asked for alternative dates or different dates than what was offered: (yes, no)

post_call_analysis_data.name: alternative_date_requested
post_call_analysis_data.description: Specific alternative date requested by user in ISO format (e.g., 2025-12-01). Empty if user didn't specify exact date but asked for alternatives

post_call_analysis_data.name: alternative_date_preference
post_call_analysis_data.description: User's preference description for alternative dates if they didn't specify exact date (e.g., 'after December 1st', 'before specific date', 'next week', 'earlier than offered'). Empty if exact date was specified

post_call_analysis_data.name: chat_type
post_call_analysis_data.description: Type of chat conversation: welcome, appointment_confirm, real_available_time

post_call_analysis_data.name: conversation_summary
post_call_analysis_data.description: Brief summary of the conversation and key outcomes

analysis_successful_prompt: Evaluate whether the agent seems to have a successful chat with the user, where the agent finishes the task, and the chat was complete without being cutoff.
analysis_summary_prompt: Write a 1-3 sentence summary of the chat based on the messages. Should capture the important information and actions taken during the chat.
